body.name: Dish Drying Mat,Dish Drying Mat for kitchen counter,Super Quick Absorbent Diatomaceous Earth Stone Drying Tray for Multiple Usage,Eco-friendly,Heat-resistant,Non-Slip Drying Stone Pad 16”x12” Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Efficient Moisture Absorption and Swift Drying】Our premium diatomaceous earth dish drying mat is engineered for exceptional moisture absorption, capable of swiftly evaporating surface moisture within minutes. Crafted from food-grade diatomaceous earth, it outperforms traditional silicone and microfiber mats, ensuring your kitchen countertops remain impeccably dry and organized. Measuring 15.7"x11.8", it accommodates most kitchen setups and tableware.

【Eco-Friendly and Reusable】Crafted from natural diatomaceous earth, a porous and durable material with exceptional water absorption, our drying mat embodies environmental consciousness and long-lasting utility. Unlike soft and fluffy fabric or silicone counterparts, our mat boasts a hard and smooth texture, ensuring healthy and eco-friendly use over an extended period.

【Anti-Slip and Heat-Resistant】The mesh like silicone is wrapped around diatomaceous mud to form a high-quality thermal insulation and strong water absorption mat,Experience the ultimate in kitchen convenience with our upgraded stone dish drying mat, superior non-slip stability. Furthermore, this mat serves as a heat-resistant surface, capable of withstanding temperatures up to 450°F/230°C, making it ideal for use with baking pans to facilitate efficient cooling.

【Effortless Maintenance】Cleaning our diatomite dish drying mat is a breeze—simply wipe it with a damp cloth or rinse it with water. For optimal results, place the mat upright in a well-ventilated area after use. Note: Avoid placing colored beverages on it to prevent staining.

【Versatile Functionality】This versatile stone drying mat isn't limited to just dish drying—it can also be used to organize freshly washed dishes, cups, utensils, and more on kitchen countertops. Additionally, it serves as an efficient heat-resistant mat, bath mat, or even a pet feeding mat, making it an ideal gift for mothers, wives, and girlfriends. Elevate your kitchen's cleanliness and aesthetic with our premium diatomaceous earth dish drying mat.
body.description: Stone Dish Drying Mat for Kitchen Counter, 16"x12" Fast Drying Super Absorbent Non-Slip Diatomite Mat, Natural Diatomaceous Earth Dish Drying Pad for Dish Rack Kitchen Dish Mat, Silicone Baking Mat, Non-Slip Silicone Mat for Kitchen Counter, Heat Resistant, Waterproof, Dishwasher Safe, Oilproof, Easy to Clean This kitchen dish mat is made of high-quality silicone, which is soft, durable, and heat-resistant. It has a non-slip design on the bottom, which can effectively prevent the mat from slipping on the table or countertop, and protect your kitchen from scratches. The mat is also lightweight and easy to clean, making it a convenient choice for daily use. The mat has a size of 16 x12 inches, which can cover a wide range of areas in the kitchen, such as the stovetop, sink, countertop, or table. It is also suitable for various activities, such as cooking, baking, mixing, and kneading, providing a comfortable and safe working environment. It is also easy to store and carry, and can be folded or rolled up for convenient storage when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dish drying mat
reviews.reviewText: I’m impressed with this dish drying mat! It is a mix of the diatomaceous earth stone and a good quality plastic. It is a very good size and it looks attractive on the counter. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dish Drying Mat for kitchen counter, Super Quick Absorbent Diatomaceous Earth Stone Drying Tray
reviews.reviewText: This quick drying mat works just as advertised and looks nice on the Kitchen counter, it is Heat-resistant, Non-Slip Drying Stone Pad that measures 16”x12” and comes in Grey. This is a nice add to any Kitchen.
